scripts.run-ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle  && react-native run-ios
scripts.run-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && react-native run-android
scripts.run-desktop: yarn run remove-bundle && yarn run prod-web && yarn run start-electron
scripts.pack-linux: yarn run remove-bundle && yarn run prod-web && electron-packager . --overwrite --asar=true--platform=linux --arch=x64 --icon=src/assets/icon.png --prune=true --out=release-builds-linux
scripts.pack-windows: yarn run remove-bundle && yarn run prod-web && electron-packager . --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=src/assets/icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds-win --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName='ReactNativeWebDesktopDemo'
scripts.pack-mac: yarn run remove-bundle && yarn run prod-web && electron-packager . --overwrite --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=src/assets/icon.icns --prune=true --out=release-builds-mac
